00049 class OSIMCOMMON_API rdMath
00050 {
00051 //=============================================================================
00052 // DATA
00053 //=============================================================================
00054 public:
00055     static const double PI_2;
00056     static const double SMALL;
00057     static const double ZERO;
00058     static const double MINUS_INFINITY;
00059     static const double PLUS_INFINITY;
00060 
00061 //=============================================================================
00062 // METHODS
00063 //=============================================================================
00064 public:
00065     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00066     // NAN stuff
00067     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00068     // TODO: eventually we should stop using our own NAN and use C++'s own NaN or something better
00069     // Problem with our NAN is that we're using a small number close to zero so some code might
00070     // incorrectly round it off to zero (e.g. if comparing it to zero using IsEqual)
00071     // Should use isNAN instead of hcecking rdMath::getNAN() because once we switch to a real NaN value the
00072     // == check will fail even if it is set to NaN!
00073     static bool isNAN(double val) { return !(val ==val); }
00074     static double getNAN() {return SimTK::CNT<SimTK::Real>::getNaN();}
00075 
00076     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077     // MIN / MAX
00078     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00079     //template<class T> static inline T Min(T a,T b) { return a <= b ? a : b; }
00080     //template<class T> static inline T Max(T a,T b) { return a >= b ? a : b; }
00081     template<class T> static inline T Clamp(T x,T xmin,T xmax) { return x<xmin ? xmin : (x>xmax ? xmax : x); }
00082 
00083     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00084     // ARITHMATIC
00085     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00086     static double CopySign(double aMag,double aSign);
00087     static bool IsEqual(double aValue1,double aValue2,double aTol);
00088     static bool IsZero(double aValue);
00089     
00090     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00091     // EXPONENTIAL STEP FUNCTIONS
00092     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093     static double SigmaUp(double tau,double to,double t);
00094     static double SigmaDn(double tau,double to,double t);
00095 
00096     //--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00097     // CUBIC STEP FUNCTION
